statements: SELECT * FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE action = 'turn_on';
SELECT schedule_id, device_id, action FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, action FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, action FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE action LIKE '%off%' ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM SmartHomeSchedule;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, device_id, action FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id, schedule_time;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM SmartHomeSchedule GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_schedules > 2;

SELECT device_id, SUM(CASE WHEN action = 'turn_on' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_turn_on, SUM(CASE WHEN action = 'turn_off' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_turn_off FROM SmartHomeSchedule GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeSchedule WHERE device_id = 2 AND action LIKE '%_off%' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT name, time_start FROM schedules ORDER BY time_start;
SELECT id, name, time_end FROM schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE schedule_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, action FROM routines WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, time_start, time_end FROM schedules WHERE time_start BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT routines.action, schedules.name, schedules.time_start FROM routines INNER JOIN schedules ON routines.schedule_id = schedules.id;
SELECT id, name FROM schedules ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT schedules.name, routines.action FROM schedules LEFT JOIN routines ON schedules.id = routines.schedule_id WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices
SELECT device_name, room_id FROM smart_home_devices
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedules
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE start_time > '2023-01-01' AND end_time < '2023-02-01';
SELECT routine_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM routines ORDER BY day_of_week DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(end_time) FROM schedules GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_name, room_id FROM Room ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, room_id FROM Device WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_time FROM Schedule WHERE scheduled_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT routine_name FROM Routine WHERE routine_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Room
SELECT room_name FROM Room ORDER BY room_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Device JOIN Room ON Device.room_id = Room.room_id
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE scheduled_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59'

SELECT Routine.routine_name, Device.device_name, Schedule.scheduled_time FROM Routine JOIN Schedule ON Routine.schedule_id = Schedule.schedule_id JOIN Device ON Schedule.device_id = Device.device_id ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'camera';
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT routine_name, activation_time FROM routines WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition FROM triggers WHERE device_id = 2 AND routine_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_name = 'morning_schedule';
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition FROM triggers WHERE device_id = 101 AND trigger_condition = 'temperature';
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'light' OR device_type = 'fan';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%living room%';
